byline.contributor: Kenneth Hamilton is a pianist and the author of “After the Golden Age: Romantic Pianism and Modern Performance.”

abstract: Pianist Kenneth Hamilton explores the life and work of Franz Liszt.
snippet: The pianist Kenneth Hamilton looks at the life and work of Franz Liszt.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Kenneth Hamilton looks at the life and work of Franz Liszt.

headline.main: Still Wondering If Liszt Was Any Good
headline.print_headline: Still Wondering If Liszt Was Any Good
headline.seo: Looking at Franz Liszt on His Bicentenary
